snippet.title: Kingdom of the Dead - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the Kingdom of the Dead trailer. Prepare to take on Death's army in Kingdom of the Dead. Grab your shotgun and dive into this old school FPS featuring hand-drawn black and white visuals. As Agent Chamberlain you'll face a host of terrifying monsters sent directly from hell itself, from the angry undead to gigantic bats.

Kingdom of the Dead is now available for PC via Steam.

#GameTrailers #Gaming #KingdomOfTheDead
